attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Im sure that Tony Blair and family would have had these at his breakfast table at one time, so I'm sure he will appreciate that it's about time they came back to greet us in the morning once again.

So, sign up to encourage Tony Blair to ask Millsberry Cereal to reintroduce Lucky Charms back in the UK.

Thanks for your support.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
